articles.title: GFTUK Marks 70th Anniversary
articles.content:
GFTUK Marks 70th Anniversary 
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) marked its 70th founding anniversary. 
					 It is the mass political organization of working class faithful to the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader, and a powerful organization for ideological education. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung made sure the GFTUK was established on November 30, Juche 34 (1945), brightly indicated the way to be followed by it and led the union to make positive contributions to the revolution and construction as a reliable helper of the party. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il gave the union the important guidelines for strengthening the union's work and helped the union fulfill its mission of protecting and implementing the party's policy. 
					
					 A national meeting to mark the anniversary took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday. 
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, O Su Yong, Vice-Premier of the Cabinet Kim Tok Hun, officials of the agricultural workers' union and women's union, officials concerned and participants in the 4th national conference of chairpersons of exemplary primary organizations of the GFTUK. 
					
					 The participants heard a congratulatory message to the organizations, officials and members of the GFTUK at all levels sent by the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 The message said that for the past seven decades after its foundation the GFTUK has developed into the political organization of the popular masses boundlessly faithful to the party and successfully fulfilled its mission before the party and the revolution under the deep trust and warm care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The message noted with high appreciation that the organizations at all levels, officials and members of the union have strengthened the whole union into the glorious ranks of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's heroic working class and remained faithful to the noble mission of the political organization of the popular masses.

articles.title: Art Performance Given on Founding Anniversary of GFTUK
articles.content:
Art Performance Given on Founding Anniversary of GFTUK
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A performance "Leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un is the Lifeblood of Trade Union" was given by the Workers' Art Group of the C.C. of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to celebrate the 70th anniversary of the founding of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea.
					 Put on the stage of the performance which started with chorus "Ode to General Kim Jong Un" and "May of Victory" were diverse numbers including poem and story "Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu and Trade Union", women's vocal duet "Leader Visits Our Factory", men's vocal duet and pangchang "Our Marshal" and trumpet solo and song "The Country I Am Defending".
					
					 The performers sang in high praises of the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for founding the trade union and developing it into the revolutionary militant organization.
					
					 The numbers dealing the drive of the army and people advancing vigorously united in one mind behind Kim Jong Un were also put on the stage of the performance.
					
					 Among the audience were O Su Yong, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, officials of the working people's organizations, officials concerned and participants in the 4th national conference of chairpersons of exemplary primary organizations of the GFTUK.

articles.title: DPRK Red Cross Society Delegation Leaves for Switzerland
articles.content:
DPRK Red Cross Society Delegation Leaves for Switzerland
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society led by Executive Vice-Chairman Paek Yong Ho left here on Monday to take part in the international red cross meeting due in Geneva, Switzerland.

articles.title: Singaporean President on Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Singaporean President on Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Chol Nam, DPRK ambassador to Singapore, presented his credentials to its President Tony Tan Keng Yam on Nov. 26.
					 The president said that it is the consistent stand of his government to develop the bilateral multi-faceted relations with the DPRK, adding that those ties are now favorably developing these days.
					
					 He stressed that Singapore would make positive efforts to boost the bilateral relations on the principle of respect for sovereignty and non-interference in other's internal affairs in the future, too.

articles.title: Film Show Held to Mark Polish Theatre Anniversary
articles.content:
Film Show Held to Mark Polish Theatre Anniversary 
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- There took place a film show at the Chollima Hall of Culture in the joint name of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the Polish embassy here and the Korea-Poland Friendship Association on Monday to mark the 250th founding anniversary of State Theatre of Poland. 
					 Present at the film show were Ryu Kyong Il, vice-chairman of the Korea-Poland Friendship Association, officials concerned, citizens, Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Krzysztof Ciebien and his embassy officials. 
					
					 The participants enjoyed a Polish feature film.

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of Korean Central History Museum Marked
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of Korean Central History Museum Marked 
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The 70th founding anniversary of the Korean Central History Museum was marked. 
					 The museum is a reliable base of the country for preserving national heritage and powerful center for implanting the Korean nation-first spirit into the minds of the people. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung made sure the museum was opened on December 1, Juche 34 (1945) and gave field guidance to it several times to clarify the tasks and ways for the work of the museum. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il saw to it that the museum was updated, and solved all the problems arising in the museum work and guided the work of discovering the historic relics till the last period of his life. 
					
					 For seven decades since its establishment the Korean Central History Museum has successfully performed its mission and duty as a base for preserving national heritage, precious historic relics of the country, and center of education for the masses by widely introducing the time-honored history and tradition of the nation under the leadership and deep care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 There took place a meeting to mark the anniversary on Monday.

articles.title: Indomitable Spirit Brings Home Silver
articles.content:
Indomitable Spirit Brings Home Silver
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) ? It is well known that Rim Jong Sim, woman weightlifter of the DPRK, won three silver medals in the 75 kg category of the World Weightlifting Championship held in Houston, U.S., on November 27, 2015, despite of her injury.
					 Rim injured herself while attempting her third snatch, which she failed. 
					
					 She had a painful left hip injury, which meant she was unable to rotate her hips. She also stretched a muscle and had knee complaint.
					
					 According to the IWF TCRR, the doctor on duty gave her medical opinion and advice, but could not stop her continuing through her own will.
					
					 After undergoing 15 minutes of spraying and strapping treatment, Rim made a few tentative lifts. She was cheered by the large crowd when she came out for her first clean and jerk attempt at 150 kg, made the lift and collapsed.
					
					 Rim hobbled off stage and came back for more. She did it again--the lift and the collapse--at 155 kg, after which she was given a standing ovation. 
					
					 The crowd were on their feet again when she made another, failed attempt at 157 kg, and fell back in distress.
					
					 She was helped on to the podium by the gold medalist and bronze winner.
					
					 "It was an honour to compete against her. She is a hero," said Olga Zubova, who took clean and jerk gold.
					
					 Kang Yue, the Chinese winner, also praised Rim for her "spirit and sportsmanship" and Jenny Arthur, an American weightlifter, said "That took a huge amount of courage."
					
					 Kang made only two good lifts to finish 2 kg ahead of Rim.
					
					 Upon receiving the news of her match, the people in the DPRK are sending encouragement and congratulations to her for displaying indomitable spirit in the match.

articles.title: 53-storied Building Symbolic of Mirae Scientists Street
articles.content:
53-storied Building Symbolic of Mirae Scientists Street
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The construction of the Mirae Scientists Street in Pyongyang was recently brought to completion as required by the building of a highly civilized socialist nation.
					 All the buildings in the street represent well the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea calling for attaching importance to science and talents.
					
					 Typical of them is a 53-storied building, the highest one peculiar in architectural style.
					
					 From the architectural point of view, it has six semi-elliptic wings with elevator shafts and stairways as their centre, which looks like the electron orbit when looking down from the sky.
					
					 On the top of the building, there is a globe and a model satellite going round it, which are supported by a tower, to be symbolic of the space science.

articles.title: Deep Attention Paid to Environmental Protection of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Deep Attention Paid to Environmental Protection of Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A number of achievements have been made in environmental protection of Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Over 150 settling ponds were repaired this year to prevent pollution of the Taedong and Pothong rivers.
					
					 Taking the lead in this repairing campaign were officials and employees of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, Mangyongdae Chicken Farm and other industrial establishments in the city.

articles.title: Food Show Conducive to Development of Traditional Dishes
articles.content:
Food Show Conducive to Development of Traditional Dishes
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A national food show took place here some days ago.
					 What caught visitorsâ€™ eyes at the show were local specialties like Pyongyang cold noodle, Pyongyang Onban (cooked rice served in chicken soup) and chicken soup boiled with ginseng.
					
					 According to Jo Hi Guk, secretary of the C.C., Korean Association of Cooks, a number of local specialties were presented to the show.
					
					 In particular, local specialties presented by Ryanggang won high appraisal at the show, he said, adding:
					
					 The show came to be an occasion conducive to improving the diet of our people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. Move to Sell New Type Missiles to S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. Move to Sell New Type Missiles to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Bureau of Cooperation in Defence and Security under the U.S. Defense Department announced that the U.S. Department of State decided to sell to south Korea new type Harpoon missiles worth 110 million dollars, according to U.S. media.
					 It is said that the missiles manufactured by Boeing Company has two times longer firing range than those sold to south Korea in the past.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday said this indicated that the U.S. reached a dangerous phase in its hostile policy towards the DPRK to egg the south Korean ultra-right conservative forces on to escalate the confrontation with the north, drive a wedge in the process for improving the inter-Korean relations and stifle the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. through its arms sale is to pit Koreans against each other, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. to continue using the south Korean military gangsters as a shock force for a war of aggression against the north and go over to an actual war any time. Herein lie the danger and gravity of the U.S. move to sell its new type missiles to south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. seeks another aim through its arms sale.
					
					 Not only the U.S. Department of Defense but also the administration is playing the role of an agent and broker by helping its munitions industries expand their arms markets to bring bigger profits to them.
					
					 South Korea has turned into a major market for U.S. weaponry.
					
					 The above-said facts go to prove that the U.S. is the arch criminal disturbing peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can browbeat someone with its new type missiles.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Unprecedented Big Fish Hauls, Following Example of KPA
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Unprecedented Big Fish Hauls, Following Example of KPA 
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- It is the revolutionary spirit peculiar to the Korean People's Army to absolutely and unconditionally carry out the orders and instructions of the party and display matchless courage, the spirit of fierce attack and the trait of devotedly implementing them, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The big fish hauls in the east sea are a manifestation of the KPA's spirit of devotedly defending the leader and carrying out his order under any circumstance as it shares thought, breath and step with the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It is necessary to bring about a radical turn in the development of the fishing industry by learning from the fighting spirit of the KPA which has firmly upheld the party's leadership authority and fully ensured the trust of the people in the party and strikingly demonstrated the validity and vitality of the party's fishery policy under the uplifted banner of creating the history of big fish haul.
					
					 The civilian fishery field should uphold with loyalty the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il with big fish hauls just as the officials and employees in the fishery field of the KPA have done and thus make the whole country deluged with news of big fish hauls under socialism.
					
					 Big fish hauls can be reported from every fishing ground and hurrah for socialism heard from across the country only when the officials and fishermen in the civilian fishery field strive hard to catch more fishes like those in the fishery field of the KPA, highly aware that their field is the first line for defending socialism. 
					
					 The editorial calls on all officials, party members and other working people in the field of fisheries to intensify the drive for effecting a signal boost in fishing and decisively develop the nation's fishing industry by learning from fighting spirit of the KPA and thus significantly greet the 7th Congress of the WPK with spectacular successes in fishing.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Stop Their Anti-DPRK Nuclear Racket
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Stop Their Anti-DPRK Nuclear Racket
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- During her recent foreign junkets, the south Korean chief executive was busy with diplomacy for soliciting cooperation in the anti-DPRK nuclear racket while talking about the "nuclear threat from the north" and crying out for the "north's dismantlement of its nuclear weapon" wherever she went. The south Korean authorities are going to stage a confab on the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula with the U.S. and Japan in Washington some days later.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article terms the anti-DPRK nuclear racket kicked off by the south Koran authorities as unpardonable traitorous moves to stifle the compatriots in the north in collusion with the U.S. and other outside forces. 
					
					 The above-said racket is a revelation of the sinister scenario to prevent the desire to achieve reunification through the alliance with the north from growing stronger among people of different social standings in south Korea and persistently pursue the policy of confrontation, the article says, adding:
					
					 Support and sympathy with the Songun politics, a treasured sword for defending peace on the peninsula, are also growing stronger in south Korea.
					
					 Much upset by these developments, the south Korean authorities are desperately working to step up their treacherous policy of confrontation, malignantly slandering the DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and nuclear deterrence by peddling the fictitious "nuclear threat from the north."
					
					 The south Korean authorities are getting ever more undisguised in their anti-DPRK nuclear racket in a bid to chill the people's ever-growing sentiment of supporting the Songun politics and check the movement for achieving the reunification through the alliance with the north. This is the treacherous act of going against the trend of the times towards independent reunification. 
					
					 They should drop the anachronistic conception of confrontation, stop the anti-DPRK nuclear racket and opt for creating favorable conditions and environment for having dialogue and improving the relations between the north and the south.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Ruling Forces' Vicious Moves to Obstruct Probe into Ferry Sinking Case Disclosed
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Ruling Forces' Vicious Moves to Obstruct Probe into Ferry Sinking Case Disclosed
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative ruling forces are obstructing the probe into the truth behind the sinking of ferry Sewol in a bid to evade responsibility for it.
					 The Yonhap News of south Korea said on Nov. 24 the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster made a decision to look into what the chief executive had done for seven hours on the day of the disaster and Chongwadae's response to it.
					
					 But the spokesman for Chongwadae opposed the investigation, claiming the "president" and Chongwadae are not subject to investigation and it is unconstitutional.
					
					 The ruling "Saenuri Party" also opposed the decision, saying the "president" has nothing to do with the disaster.
					
					 Seoul Economic Daily on the same day denounced the ruling party for crying out for disbanding the Ad hoc committee.
					
					 According to it, the gentries of the "Saenuri Party" are crying out for disbanding the committee, asserting it is mulling revising the law for the immediate dismissal of the members of the committee and for the formation of a new committee.
					
					 These facts clearly revealed the true aim sought by the south Korean ruling forces to cover up the truth behind the sinking case and evade the responsibility.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried on Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried on Romanian Paper
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The gist of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was carried on the November issue of the newspaper Romania Muncitoare.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and indicates the tasks for steadily developing the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Hungarian Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Hungarian Political Figure
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, issued a statement on Nov. 20 to praise Marshal Kim Jong Un as a brilliant commander.
					 The chairman said:
					
					 The grit of Kim Jong Un, the youngest statesman in the present world, is now drawing the attention of the world community.
					
					 He resolutely smashed the U.S. and its allies' frantic provocative racket over the DPRK's launch of its first working satellite in December, 2012 and made sure that its third underground nuclear test was conducted.
					
					 He held an emergency operation meeting on the fire strike mission of the strategic rocket force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in March, 2013 at which he examined the plan for fire strike of the strategic rocket force at the U.S. bases in the Pacific operational sphere including its mainland, Hawaii, Guam and U.S. forces' bases in south Korea and finally ratified it. 
					
					 He inspected Panmunjom where U.S. ultra-modern military hardware and ultra-precision surveillance devices are deployed and had taken photos with each serviceperson there after letting even those who were on duties change their guards.
					
					 In April, 2014 when the first meeting of airpersons of the KPA was held in Pyongyang he invited all airpersons of the whole army to attend it, keeping the territorial air of the country open though aircrafts of the U.S.  imperialists were busy with madcap drills in the sky over south Korea. This fact represented the victory of the DPRK's pluck, grit, mettle and the spiritual world of the heroic airpersons which outdid the enemies.
					
					 He is possessed of the invincible grit to win the final victory.
					
					 He initiated and guided the drills of all services of the KPA for striking the enemy's naval targets in January, 2015. He said full of confidence that the DPRK was capable of coping with all sorts of war, operation and battle chosen by the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Great Persons of Mt. Paektu to Be Praised in Britain
articles.content:
Great Persons of Mt. Paektu to Be Praised in Britain
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A British preparatory committee for 2017 meeting for praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in London on Nov. 21.
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for Concluding Peace Treaty Supported by Chilean Political Party
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for Concluding Peace Treaty Supported by Chilean Political Party
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The mission of the Communist Party of Chile in Cuba issued a statement on Nov. 23 in support of the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty with the U.S.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We extend full support to the DPRK's fair and aboveboard proposal for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty 
					
					 It is more urgently required than ever before to defuse the tension which may spark a war on the Korean Peninsula and ensure the regional peace and stability.
					
					 Replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty in order to put a definite end to the vicious cycle of confrontation and escalating tension is the most important link in the chain of efforts for settling the issues between the DPRK and the U.S. and a matter on which the U.S. should make a bold decision. 
					
					 The U.S. should accept the DPRK's proposal for concluding the peace treaty and opt for putting an end to the state of war on the peninsula.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the DPRK in its efforts to protect the sovereignty of the country and nation from the U.S. hostile policy towards it.

articles.title: FGSC conmemora 70o aniversario de su fundacion
articles.content:
FGSC conmemora 70o aniversario de su fundacion
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) es una organizacion politica masiva de la clase obrera fiel al Partido del Trabajo de Corea y a la causa del lider y la entidad potente de la educacion ideologica.
					  El Presidente Kim Il Sung la fundo el 30 de noviembre del 34 (1945) de la Era Juche, ilumino el camino a seguir y condujo a la federacion contribuir a la revolucion y la construccion como ayudante confiable del Partido.
					
					  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dio la guia programatica para fortalecer la labor de la FGSC y la confianza a esta a cumplir la mision como defensora y ejecutante de la politica del Partido.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion con la participacion de Yang Hyong Sop, O Su Yong, el vicepremier Kim Tok Hun, los funcionarios de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea, la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea y la rama interesada y los participantes de la IV Conferencia Nacional de Presidentes Ejemplares de las Organizaciones de Base de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea.
					
					  En el acto fue transmitido un mensaje de felicitacion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea enviado a las organizaciones a todos niveles, los funcionarios y los miembros de la FGSC.
					
					  El mensaje senala que durante 70 anos despues de su fundacion, la FGSC se ha fortalecido y desarrollado como organizacion politica masiva infinitamente fiel al partido bajo la gran confianza y profunda atencion de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y cumplio magnificamente su mision asumida ante el Partido y la revolucion.
					
					  Evalua mucho el hecho de que las organizaciones a todos niveles, los funcionarios y los miembros de la FGSC convirtieron sus entidades en las filas honrosas de la heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y han sido fieles a la mision noble de la organizacion politica masiva asumida ante la revolucion.

articles.title: Efectuada funcion de grupo de propaganda artistica obrera
articles.content:
Efectuada funcion de grupo de propaganda artistica obrera 
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El grupo central de propaganda artistica obrera de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) ofrecio el dia 30 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la funcion "La Direccion del respetado Mariscal Kim Jong Un es lo mas importante en el trabajo de la FGSC" dedicada al 70o aniversario de esta organizacion obrera.
					En la escena se pusieron el coro "Himno al General Kim Jong Un" y "Mayo de triunfo", el recital de poesia "Grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y la FGSC", el  duo femenino "Presidente visito nuestra fabrica", el duo masculino y panchang "Nuestro General", el solo de trompeta y la cancion "Mi patria que defiendo", la pieza corta de teatro "Ultima persona", etc.
					
					Los interpretes cantaron en tono patetico las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes crearon la federacion de sindicatos y la fortalecieron como organizacion combativa y revolucionaria.
					
					Ellos ofrecieron tambien las piezas que muestran el aspecto del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que avanzan con vigor uniendose monoliticamente en torno al Mariscal.
					
					La vieron el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, O Su Yong, el presidente del Comite Central de la FGSC, Ju Yong Gil, los funcionarios de las entidades de masas y de la rama correspondiente y los participantes en la IV Conferencia Nacional de Presidentes Ejemplares de las Organizaciones de Base de la FGSC.

articles.title: Singapur mantiene posicion de desarrollar multilateralmente relaciones con RPDC
articles.content:
Singapur mantiene posicion de desarrollar multilateralmente relaciones con RPDC
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Chol Nam, embajador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presento el dia 26 sus cartas credenciales ante Tony Tan Keng Yam, presidente de la Republica de Singapur.
					En la audiencia, Tony dijo que su gobierno mantiene invariablemente la posicion de desarrollar multilateralmente las relaciones bilaterales con la RPDC. Y anadio que en estos dias se desarrollan positivamente dia a dia las relaciones existentes entre ambos paises.
					
					Puntualizo que se esforzara mas activamente por desarrollar las relaciones entre los paises a base de los principios de respeto a la soberania y no intervencion en los asuntos internos.
